com.worldpay.library.swipers

Interface SwiperController


  • public interface SwiperController
    This is the core object used to represent the swiper. This object becomes a base class for specific swiper objects designed for the given peripheral

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
